Name: Pingdom - Create Uptime Check
Description: Creates Pingdom http check using [Create New Check API method](https://www.pingdom.com/resources/api#MethodCreate+New+Check).
Author: sarbis

Parameters.Name: Pingdom.CheckContactIds
Parameters.Label: Contact Ids
Parameters.HelpText: Pingdom contact identifiers. For example contactids=154325,465231,765871.

Parameters.Name: Pingdom.CheckSendNotificationWhenDown
Parameters.Label: Send notification when down
Parameters.HelpText: Send notification when down n times.

Parameters.Name: Pingdom.CheckNotifyAgainEvery
Parameters.Label: Notify every
Parameters.HelpText: Notify again every n result. 0 means that no extra notifications will be sent.

Parameters.Name: Pingdom.CheckAuth
Parameters.Label: Auth
Parameters.HelpText: Username and password for target HTTP authentication. Example: user:password.

Parameters.Name: Pingdom.CheckShouldContain
Parameters.Label: Should contain
Parameters.HelpText: Target site should contain this string.

Parameters.Name: Pingdom.CheckShouldNotContain
Parameters.Label: Should not contain
Parameters.HelpText: Target site should NOT contain this string. If shouldcontain is also set, this parameter is not allowed.

Parameters.Name: Pingdom.CheckPostData
Parameters.Label: Post data
Parameters.HelpText: Data that should be posted to the web page, for example submission data for a sign-up or login form. The data needs to be formatted in the same way as a web browser would send it to the web server
